display_long_description:
# Description

Rolling eggs, overflowing monsters! Dive into the fast-paced puzzle action of "Egg Rumble"—fun for everyone!

Egg Rumble is a casual versus puzzle game with simple, intuitive controls. Match four eggs of the same pattern to hatch monsters. Your monsters push the flag into your opponent’s base, but your rival will hatch their own monsters to push back! Every match is a dynamic and thrilling tug-of-war.

Each egg pattern creates a unique monster, and combos unleash even stronger monsters! Outsmart your opponent with strategy and enjoy exciting real-time battles.

Games are quick and easy, perfect for a short break or playing with friends. Battle online against friends or players worldwide.

Experience a new style of puzzle action, where easy controls and lively battles make every game fresh and fun!

# Key Features

- Simple controls anyone can enjoy
- Unique monsters with special abilities
- Stronger monsters through combo chains
- Online battles with friends and global players
- Short, fast-paced matches
- Colorful graphics and cheerful sounds

# About Early Access

Egg Rumble is available as an Early Access release.
We are updating the game to improve balance, fix bugs, and enhance the experience. Feedback is welcome, though we may not respond to every request.
Thank you for supporting Egg Rumble as we continue development!
